In Fall 2022 I took Statistical Genetics, which introduced me to the field and got me really interested in pursuing a career in health/genetics related data science. I had a great time learning how to use both R and PLINK to analyze genomic data - you can check out everything I learned [here](https://statgensummary.netlify.app).
